#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long int dp[1010][1010];

long long int rmin(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a<b)
		return a;
	else 
		return b;
}

long long int OPT(long long int i, long long int j, char X[], char Y[])
{
	//cout<<"Entered";
	if(dp[i][j]==-1)
	{
		if(i==0)
		{	
			//cout<<"i=0";
			dp[i][j] = j;
		}
		else if(j==0)
		{
			//cout<<"j=0";
			dp[i][j] = i;
		}
		else if(X[i-1]==Y[j-1])
		{
			//cout<<"X[i]==Y[j]";
			dp[i][j] = 1 + OPT(i-1,j-1,X,Y);
		}
		else 
		{
			//cout<<"X[i]!=Y[j]";
			dp[i][j] = 1 + rmin(OPT(i-1,j,X,Y), OPT(i,j-1,X,Y));
		}
	}

	return dp[i][j];
}
void solve(long long int testcase)
{
	
	long long int p,q,ans,i,j;
	cin>>p>>q;

	char X[p+4],Y[q+4];

	cin>>X>>Y;
	
	//memset(dp,-1,(p+1)*(q+1)*sizeof(long long));
	for(i=0;i<=p;i++)
		for(j=0;j<=q;j++)
			dp[i][j]=-1;
	
	ans = OPT(p,q,X,Y);
	/*for(i=0;i<=p;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=q;j++)
			cout<<dp[i][j]<<" ";
			cout<<endl;
		}*/
	cout<<"Case "<<testcase+1<<": "<<ans<<endl;
	
}

int main()
{
	long long int n,i;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		solve(i);

}
